ResourceMiner.name: observe_global_map
ResourceMiner.description: This action involves observing the global map to assess the current state of the grid and resource availability, laying the groundwork for subsequent strategic decisions.

output_updates.name: map_state
output_updates.description: A representation of the current state of the grid map, including resource availability.

ResourceMiner.name: decide_action
ResourceMiner.description: This action entails making strategic decisions regarding whether to occupy, maintain, or compete for land ownership based on observed map data.

required_variables.name: map_state
required_variables.description: Current observed state of the grid map to inform decision making.

output_updates.name: action_plan
output_updates.description: The plan detailing whether the agent will occupy, maintain, or compete for a cell.

ResourceMiner.name: execute_occupy_or_maintain
ResourceMiner.condition: Decision to occupy or maintain land ownership
ResourceMiner.description: In this action, the agent undertakes to occupy new land or maintain control over already owned land by investing energy.

required_variables.name: energy_investment
required_variables.description: Energy the agent has decided to invest in occupying or maintaining land.

required_variables.name: cell_coordinates
required_variables.description: Coordinates of the grid cell targeted for occupation or maintenance.

required_variables.name: previous_owner
required_variables.description: Identifier of the previous owner of the land, if applicable.

output_updates.name: new_land_status
output_updates.description: Updates the ownership status of the targeted cell in the environment.

ResourceMiner.name: execute_compete
ResourceMiner.condition: Decision to compete for land ownership
ResourceMiner.description: This action involves competing with other miners for the acquisition of land ownership by investing strategic amounts of energy.

required_variables.name: energy_investment
required_variables.description: Energy the agent has decided to invest in competing for land ownership.

required_variables.name: cell_coordinates
required_variables.description: Coordinates of the grid cell targeted for competition.

required_variables.name: current_owner
required_variables.description: Identifier of the current owner of the land being competed for.

output_updates.name: competition_result
output_updates.description: Updates the environment with the result of the competition for the targeted cell.

ResourceMiner.name: exploit_resources
ResourceMiner.description: The agent exploits the resources of a grid cell they have successfully occupied, maintained, or won via competition.

required_variables.name: new_owner
required_variables.description: Identifier of the agent now owning the land.

required_variables.name: cell_coordinates
required_variables.description: Coordinates of the grid cell being exploited for resources.

output_updates.name: resource_count
output_updates.description: Number of resource units successfully extracted from the grid cell.
